jd: From: zaid, Panzer zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Reply to: zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Hi,How are you doing well!My name is Zaid Khan, and I am a certified LinkedIn Recruiter currently working as a Talent Acquisition Specialist at Panzer Solutions LLC. We specialize in both IT and non-IT recruitment services across the U.S. I wanted to inform you about an exciting opportunity we have with one of your preferred clients. If you're available and interested, please let me know. You can also send me your updated resume and the best contact number for a quick follow-upPS: ONLY CANDIDATE Willing to Move to AUSTIN, TX will be considered. Candidates with Lead Java Developer with Mulesoft Experience will be considered for this positionCandidates willing to attend Face-TO-Face Interview will be considered for this positionTitle: Lead Java Developer with MulesoftLocation: Austin, TXLength: 12 MonthsHybrid: (Austin TX-Hybrid)Note : Previous State Project Expereince is Not Mandatory - But a Plus Point Only Active LinkedIn ID is Must Description:The Software Developer at this level is responsible for knowing numerous development languages and platforms. Those include Java, Spring, Angular, Tomcat, and Hibernate. This resource is also expected to have a strong working knowledge of integration patterns and the use of Mulesoft, along with numerous code libraries that include Ag-GRID, IBM Process Automation Manager, Maven repositories, and the use of Azure DevOps code management principles.Minimum Yrs of Experience, Skills, and Qualifications12 Yrs experience in Java, Spring, Angular, Tomcat, Mulesoft and Hibernate10 Years Researching, designing, implementing, and managing software programs10 Yrs Testing and evaluating programs6+ Yrs Working closely with other developers, UX designers, business and systems analystsPreferred Skills and Qualifications6+ Performance Management for custom developed applications1+ Designed and developed automation processes using tools such as Selenium.
